"An Unexpected Meeting":
"Lillipa's abandoned quarry seems so calm
that even the Lillipans live there. Yet,
several ARKS ops have been active in
the area, whether to patrol an area
designated as dangerous, or for some
other reason. Some may have noble
intentions, others roam aimlessly. Just
what is going to show up there?
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated"
